description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
7- 23, Friend Street, Islington, London, EC1V 7NS

TPO Reference:
T2 – London Plane of LBI TPO (No.224) 2001
T3 – Lime of LBI TPO (No.224) 2001

PO Number:
T100373

Work specifications:
1 x London Plane (T2) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.224) 2001
Crown lift up to a maximum height of 7 m above ground level
Crown thin by a maximum of 25% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear property to give a clearance of 4m (20% reduction and shape in on the building side only).

1 x Lime (T3) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.224) 2001
Remove basal growth
Crown thin by a maximum of 25% and remove deadwood
Prune to clear property to give a clearance of 4m (20% reduction and shape in on the building side only).
decision_conditions: The works specifications have been lessened following negotiation with the agent. The works being lessened from an overall crown reduction to a reduction back from property and crown thin. These works are in line with the recommendations given for planning application P081443 where permission was granted for the ground floor extension towards these protected trees.
